subtitle: These classic little chewy biscuits are utterly delicious - perfect for unexpected guests or as an after dinner treat.

method.text: Place cherries, peel, almonds, butter, sugar, honey and cream together in a saucepan. Heat gently for 2-3 min until butter and sugar have melted and all are mixed together.
Place half a teaspoonful of the mixture at a time onto baking trays lined with baking parchment, leaving enough room for spreading. Then spread each dollop of mixture out evenly.
Bake for 5-8 min until golden brown.  Remove from oven and leave to cool slightly on the trays. Then remove and leave to cool completely on wire racks.
Place the chocolate in a heatproof bowl and set over a saucepan of simmering water.  Heat gently for 3-5 min until melted and remove from heat.
Coat the bases of the Florentines liberally with chocolate and leave until beginning to set.  Then, using a fork, gently mark ripples in the chocolate and leave until set.

title: Festive Florentines
